text: Bafisa ukuthi nani ningakholwa njengoba bengakholwanga nokuthi nifane ningenzi abangane phakathi kwabo kuze kube bafudukela endleleni kaMvelinqangi kepha uma bephendukela emuva (benqaba) babambeni nibabulale noma ngabe ikuphi lapho nibathola khona futhi ningathathi abangani phakathi kwabo futhi ningathathi basizi
